title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Technology Utilization for Enhancing Construction Engineering Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic construction terminology and fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create simple structural models using basic BIM (Building Information Modeling) functions on a smartphone.
Learners can analyze three or more cases using augmented reality (AR) simulation tools for construction site problem-solving.
Learners can perform real-time construction project management scenarios with team members using mobile collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
